hints.content:
The number line shows $\maroonD{4}$ equal jumps of $\blueD{5}$ units.

![The same number line with each arrow labeled, plus 5](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1df542fcfeba82589910c6124d1eff889d3926f1)

options.explanation:
$\maroonD{4}\times\blueD{5}=\maroonD{4}\blueD{\text{ fives}}$.

That's the same as $\maroonD{2}\blueD{\text{ fives}}+\maroonD{2}\blueD{\text{ fives}}$.

![The same number line with a brace spanning the first 2 arrows labeled, 2 fives, and a brace spanning the other 2 arrows labeled, 2 fives](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fd242db75c604d4164ac93e194317eab6d16809a)

$\redD{10}+\purpleC{10}=\greenD{20}$

So $\maroonD{4}\times\blueD{5}=\greenD{20}$.
